description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Design, implement, test, deploy, and support new artificial intelligence functionality as well as integrating the latest algorithms from research publications and repositories for using on a diverse set of cloud/IoT platforms;
              
              - Contribute to the continuous development and maintenance of the Arrive’s Cloud Framework Architecture, ensure a robust and reliable system, incorporate the latest technologies for machine learning, data mining, communication and messaging in large distributed systems.
              
              - Develop in C/C++, JavaScript’s, Python for integrated cloud architectures and implement, test, document, and successfully run developed codes on distributed cloud systems.
              
              **Working conditions:
              
              - To work at E.town Building, PCs with strong configuration, modern lab (telecoms equipments and embedded systems in MAN/WAN networks, etc...)
              
              - Offered competitive salary rate
              
              - Dinner & parking allowance at e.town since probation time
              
              - Other allowances: transportation, lunch, health insurance at international hospitals located in Viet Nam (such as Phap Viet, Colombia, An Sinh,..)
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - BS/MS in computer science, software engineering.
              
              - Working knowledge of one or more of the following areas: Virtualization, Cloud, Data center, IoT, natural language processing, machine learning, computer vision.
              
              - Required computer/technical skills: experience in C /C++ or Python, JavaScript, Linux, Virtualization, Docker/Container, Git.
              
              - Other (Describe – i.e., progressive, domestic/foreign travel, foreign language): ability to self-study & work under high pressure, dynamic environment as part of a multi-disciplinary research team.
              
              - Good at problem solving & communication skills.
              

              **Preferred
              
              - Experienced in solving real-world problems with machine and deep learning models.
              
              - Expertise in modern deep learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Caffe2, Theano, MXNet, CNTK, or Keras.
              
              - Expertise in at least one general purpose programming language such as Python, Javascript, or C/C++.
              
              - M.S. degree or equivalent experience in machine learning/deep learning.
              
              - Experienced in common middleware and messaging solutions such as DDS (Data Distribution Service), ZeroMQ, Protobuf/gRPC, RESTful API, Kubernetes, etc. a plus
              

              **Interested candidates please send the resume (describing education, experiences, and expected salary) with subject is the position you would like to apply "Software Engineer (Artificial Intelligence )" via email or directly to the company address: Arrive Technologies Viet Nam, 10th Fl, e.town Building (1), 364 Cong Hoa, Tan Binh Dist., HCM City before Jun 30, 2018 (this deadline may be shortened if we get enough CV).
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13/14th month salary, Project/performance bonus, dinner, Coffee, Milk Break, Team building.
               







                Diversified Healthcare programs: Annual health check, Medical insurance, Personal accident insurance
               







                Working in global environment with overseas clients and technical experts in latest technologies
